English.alert.about:
Automate location-based tasks with GeoCuts!

Run shortcuts or send messages based on your current location.

Configure your location triggers to repeat once, hourly, daily, or every time you enter or exit a location.

Use GeoCuts with Cronios to automatically monitor your location triggers throughout the day.

Learn more at: geocuts.com
English.alert.currentLocation: Retrieving your current location using Get Current Location. This may take a few moments.
English.alert.currentLocation.weather: Retrieving your current location using Get Current Weather. This may take a moment.
English.alert.currentLocation.warning:
If any of your location triggers have invalid locations, getting the current location will cause Shortcuts to error and quit.

Relaunching GeoCuts will disable this preference, and you must correct your location triggers before you can re-enable it.
English.alert.disabled: GeoCuts monitoring is currently turned off. Open to the GeoCuts Home screen and tap Enable Monitoring…
English.alert.disabled.title: Monitoring Disabled
English.alert.import.cronJob:
Tap OK to import into Cronios.

If Import Active Status is enabled in Cronios Settings, the cron job will run automatically when you enter `Run Continuously` mode in Cronios. otherwise edit the cron job and tap Enable.

You may also want to adjust the cron schedule expression for the job to better suit the frequency of checks, which is currently set to every {{frequency}} minutes.
English.alert.import.multiple: The default location trigger template will be applied to the imported locations.
English.alert.import.multiple.title: Import Multiple Locations
English.alert.mapsURL.clipboard: The maps URL to this location has been copied to the clipboard
English.alert.reminder.created.title: New GeoCuts Reminder Created
English.alert.reminder.created: You will be reminded to run GeoCuts in order to run:
English.alert.setup.complete:
GeoCuts is ready to run shortcuts and send messages based on your location.

You can run your location triggers manually at any time by tapping Run Once.

If you want to automatically monitor your locations throughout the day, you must install Cronios and add the GeoCuts cron job.

Tap Help… from the GeoCuts Home screen to learn how to do this and more. Enjoy using GeoCuts!
English.alert.setup.complete.title: Set Up Complete!
English.alert.setup.helper:
Use the GeoCuts Helper shortcut from the iOS Home screen or Siri to immediately evaluate your location triggers.

In Maps and Contacts, add new location triggers to GeoCuts by choosing Shortcuts > GeoCuts Helper from the iOS Share Sheet.

Install GeoCuts Helper from the top of GeoCuts Home or from Settings.
English.alert.setup.helper.title: GeoCuts Helper
English.alert.shortcuts.retrieval: Retrieving a list of your shortcuts. This may take a few moments.
English.alert.success: The `{{Location Trigger}}` location trigger successfully ran.
English.alert.update.none: You are currently running the latest version of GeoCuts.
English.alert.update.none.title: No Update Available
English.error.activeTimes.outOfBounds: The end time was before the start time.
English.error.activeTimes.outOfBounds.title: Invalid Time
English.error.cronios: Cronios is not installed on this iOS device. Download it from http://cronios.com.
English.error.cronios.title: Cronios Not Installed
English.error.location.invalid:
An error occurred while running GeoCuts. Either the current location could not be retrieved or one of your location triggers may have an invalid location.

You must correct this before location trigger monitoring can work again.
English.error.location.invalid.title: Error Detected While Running GeoCuts
English.error.offline: You must be connected to the internet for this feature of GeoCuts to work.
English.error.offline.title: No Network Connection
English.error.repeatInterval: Repeat Interval cannot be a negative number. Setting Repeat Interval to minimum value of 1.
English.error.repeatInterval.title: Repeat Interval Error
English.error.triggerRadius: Trigger Radius cannot be a negative number.
English.error.triggerRadius.title: Trigger Radius Error
English.menu.entry.repeat.daily.description: This location trigger will run once a day.
English.menu.entry.repeat.everytime.description: This will run every time GeoCuts runs.
English.menu.entry.repeat.none.description: This location trigger will disable itself on success.
English.menu.entry.repeat.once.description: This location trigger will disable itself on success
English.menu.entry.toggle.description: Monitoring will occur when Cronios is active.
English.menu.entry.triggerOnExit.description: Runs when you enter and exit this location.
English.menu.entry.triggerOnExit.description.off: Runs when you enter this location.
English.menu.main.cronios.import: Add GeoCuts Cron Job to Cronios…
English.menu.main.cronios.update: Update GeoCuts Cron Job in Cronios…
English.menu.main.filter.run.description: Only filtered location triggers will be evaluated.
English.menu.main.filter.run.description.off: All location triggers will be evaluated.
English.menu.main.openMapsAfterRun.description: Enable this when actively getting directions.
English.menu.main.toggle.description: All active location triggers will be monitored.
English.menu.main.toggle.description.off: No location triggers will be monitored.
English.menu.settings.currentLocation.label: Current Location
English.menu.settings.currentWeather.description: Fast but less accurate than Current Location.
Use slower but more accurate Current Location.
English.menu.settings.descriptionLabels.descript: Displays trigger options on Home screen
English.menu.settings.lockDetection.description: Prompts to unlock device before monitoring.
Monitoring disabled when screen is off.
English.menu.settings.lockDetection.label: Lock Detection
English.menu.settings.lockDetection.mute: Don't Evaluate if Device is Muted
English.menu.settings.lockDetectionVoice: Audibly Ask to Unlock Your Device
English.menu.settings.lockDetectionVoice.descrip: A notification banner will prompt you to unlock.
English.menu.settings.quickEdit.description: Tap a location trigger to see an edit menu.
English.menu.settings.quickEdit.description.off: Tap a location trigger to edit it.
English.menu.settings.switchToShortcutsImmediate: Immediately switch to Shortcuts while running.
Notify and wait 2 seconds before switching.
English.menu.settings.useMiles.description: Trigger radius values are in miles.
English.menu.settings.useMiles.description.off: Trigger radius values are in kilometers.
English.menu.settings.wizard.description: Guides you in creating new location triggers.
English.menu.setup.cronJob: Add GeoCuts Cron Job to Cronios…
English.prompt.bulkEdit.edit: Choose an action to perform on the selected location triggers.
English.prompt.command: Choose a command to run with your location trigger.
English.prompt.delete: Delete the selected location trigger? This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.delete.plural: Delete the selected location triggers? This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.distanceUnit.kilometersToMiles: Would you like to convert the trigger radius values for your existing location triggers from kilometers to miles?
English.prompt.distanceUnit.milesToKilometers: Would you like to convert the trigger radius values for your existing location triggers from miles to kilometers?
English.prompt.donate: Enjoing GeoCuts? I'd appreciate a tip!
English.prompt.erase.content:
Are you sure you want to delete all GeoCuts content and settings for this device?

This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.erase.content2:
Are you ABSOLUTELY SURE you want to delete all GeoCuts content and settings for this device?

This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.frequency:
Add/Update GeoCuts Cron Job in Cronios

How often do you want the GeoCuts cron job to run in Cronios? Check times begin from the top of the hour.
English.prompt.import.command: Do you want to assign the default command to all imported location triggers or choose a new command for all?
English.prompt.launchAction: Choose an action to perform when launching GeoCuts.
English.prompt.location:
Trigger Location

Ensure the location is valid before running Cronios and GeoCuts, as invalid locations will cause Shortcuts to exit with an error.

Enter {{Current Location}} to create a location trigger that always runs wherever you are. Pressing OK with an empty location will return to the GeoCuts Home screen.
English.prompt.lockDetection.volume: Set the volume of the unlock prompt between 0 (current volume) and 1 (max).
English.prompt.logLevel:
Choose your level of logging:

Basic: Logs which Location Triggers have run.

Extended: Keeps track of locations you have visited when GeoCuts is running (recommended).

Developer: Records additional information for troubleshooting your Location Triggers.
English.prompt.message: Enter the message you will send to the recipient when arriving at the location.
English.prompt.name: Enter a name for your location trigger.
English.prompt.openApp: GeoCuts must switch to Shortcuts to evaluate your location triggers.
English.prompt.recipient: Separate recipients with new lines. There is a max of 5 recipients.
English.prompt.reminders.delete: You may already have reminders for this location trigger in Reminders. Delete the existing ones?
English.prompt.repeat: Do you want to set up a repeating location trigger? Choose the minimum amount of time to wait before this Location Trigger can run again.
English.prompt.repeat.days: Set the minimum number of calendar days before this location trigger can run again. The schedule resets at midnight the next day.
English.prompt.repeat.hours: Set the minimum number of hours before this location trigger can run again.
English.prompt.repeat.minutes: Set the minimum number of minutes before this location trigger can run again.
English.prompt.reset: Reset GeoCuts settings or erase all content and settings for GeoCuts?
English.prompt.reset.settings:
Are you sure you want to reset GeoCuts settings on this device?

None of your location triggers or logs will be affected.
English.prompt.revert: Revert back to the default location trigger? This operation cannot be undone.
English.prompt.schedule:
Do you want to set the times and days this Location Trigger is active?

If you choose Set Up Later, this Location Trigger will use the default settings.
English.prompt.schedule.days: Select the days you want the location trigger to run.
English.prompt.schedule.endTime: Set the end time for the location trigger.
English.prompt.schedule.startTime: Set the start time for the location trigger.
English.prompt.schedule.time: You can set your location trigger to run only within a specific timeframe during the day.
English.prompt.shortcut.default: You have `{{shortcut}}` set as a default shortcut for new location triggers. Use that shortcut or choose another?
English.prompt.setup.cronios:
Setup 6/6: GeoCuts and Cronios

Cronios automatically runs your shortcuts in the background on a schedule of your choosing.

Add GeoCuts to Cronios to evaluate your location triggers periodically throughout the day.
English.prompt.setup.currentLocation:
Setup 2/6: Current Location

Choose the method to retrieve the current location:

Get Current Weather: Faster but less accurate

Get Current Location: More accurate but slower
English.prompt.setup.distanceUnit:
Setup 1/6: Distance Unit

Choose your preferred unit of measurement for entering location trigger radius values.
English.prompt.setup.distanceUnit.convert: Looks like you already have some location triggers installed. Do you want to convert the existing trigger radius values from one distance unit to another?
English.prompt.setup.lockDetection:
Setup 4/6: Lock Detection

GeoCuts can audibly ask you to unlock your device if it detects your screen is off.
English.prompt.setup.lockDetectionPrompt: Enter the phrase GeoCuts will speak when it detects your device is locked.
English.prompt.setup.mapsApp:
Setup 3/6: Default Mapping Application

Choose the default mapping application. If you do not have either Google Maps or Waze installed, choose Maps.
English.prompt.setup.complete: What would you like to do next in GeoCuts?
English.prompt.shortcut: Choose a shortcut to run with this location trigger.
English.prompt.shortcut.search: Search for a shortcut. Searches are case-sensitive.
English.prompt.tags.filter: Filter location triggers by tag. Leave blank to show all location triggers.
English.prompt.triggerOnExit: Do you want this location trigger to run when you arrive at or leave this location?
English.prompt.triggerRadius:
Enter the maximum distance in {{distance unit}} around the location where you want the trigger to occur.

{{Location}}
English.prompt.unlock: You will need to unlock this device to retrieve the current location and continue evaluating your location triggers.
English.prompt.unlock.edit: Enter the prompt that will be shown or spoken to you when your device is locked.
